full_summary:
# W6854-250360 BRUSH REMOVAL AND STUMP CLEARING
## Solicitation Overview
A tender for the provision of brush removal and stump clearing services has been issued by the Department of National Defence (DND).

### Solicitation Details
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4647045181
* **Publication Date:** 2024-06-27
* **Closing Date and Time:** 2024-07-22T14:00:00 (Eastern Standard Time)
* **Amendment Number:** 1
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive Bid
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Contracting Entity
The contracting entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC).

### End User Entity
The end user entity is the Department of National Defence (DND).

### Mandatory Site Visit
A mandatory site visit will be held at Canadian Forces Borden on 2024-07-10 at 11:00 am. The meeting location is at 16 Ramillies Road, Borden, ON L0M 1C0.

### RFP and Amendments
The full Request for Proposal (RFP) and all amendments will be posted on SAP Ariba. The RFP and amendments can only be accessed and downloaded when logged into your SAP Ariba account and your Government of Canada profile is completed.

### Evaluation Criteria
The evaluation criteria for this RFP will be based on the "Lowest Price" principle.

### Contract Notice
Contact information for Ms. Vashti Ramnarine, Acquisitions Ontario Region, is as follows:
v.ttp://vashti.ramnarine@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca / 289-772-7284. The contact number is for general inquiries only.

### Region of Opportunity
The region of opportunity for this tender is Ontario (except National Capital Region). 

### Requirement Details
The Department of National Defence (DND), Real Properties Operations Detachment Borden (RPO Det. Borden) is seeking a contractor to provide brush removal and stump clearing services located at Canadian Forces Borden in Ontario. The period of the contract is from the date of the Contract to December 31, 2024. All bids must be submitted by the closing date and time above. Only bids submitted by this time will be considered. Bids submitted after the closing time will be declared non-responsive.
